A mụrụ Ntshavheni n'obodo Sibasa na Transvaal Province

Nne ya na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ tagzi, ebe nna ya nwere ụlọ ahịa na-ere ahịa. Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mbilwi Secondary School wee nweta nzere MBA na Mahadum Bradford na United Kingdom na 2008. Ihe ndị ọzọ o nwetara gụnyere nzere BA Hons na Development Studies na nzere BA Hon na Labour Relations, nzere abụọ ahụ nwetara na Mahadum Rand Afrikaans.
O nwere ahụmịhe ọrụ na ngalaba nke Strategic Management, Information Technology, Change Management, na Communication and Marketing
Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere onye nduzi na onye isi oche nke Nkho Trading.
PNtshavheni jere ozi dị ka onye isi obodo nke Ba-Phalaborwa Local Municipality na Limpopo site na 2008 ruo 2010

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye njikwa njem nleta na Trade and Investment Limpopo, Chief Information Officer maka Limpopo Provincial Department of Local Government and Housing, na ọnụ na-ekwuchitere onye isi ala nke Limpopo

Ọ bụkwa onye nkuzi na Mahadum nke South Africa na Chief Operating Officer na State Information Technology Agency (SITA). N'ọnwa Julaị afọ puku abụọ na iri na ise, Minista na-ahụ maka ụlọ ọrụ ọha na eze bụ Lynne Brown họpụtara ya na Board of Denel, n'ọrụ onye na-abụghị onye nduzi.
Ntshavheni bụ onye otu African National Congress Youth League's National Executive Committee (NEC)

Ọ bụ onye na-ekere òkè na ọtụtụ ihe metụtara ọdịmma nke ndị ntorobịa na obodo. N'ọnwa Eprel afọ puku abụọ na iri na atọ , Ntshavheni bụ otu n'ime mmadụ iri abụọ na abụọ a họpụtara na otu ANC National Task Team, nke e nyere ọrụ iwughachi ihe owuwu nke ANC Youth League (ANCYL) site na alaka, mpaghara na mpaghara.
Mgbe a họpụtara ya na National Assembly na Mee 2019, Onye isi ala Cyril Ramaphosa họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke Mmepe Obere Azụmaahịa.
Mgbe ọnwụ nke Minista nọ n'ọchịchị: Atụmatụ, Nlekota na Nnyocha, Jackson Mthembu, na Jenụwarị 2021, a họpụtara Ntshavheni dị ka onye nọchiri ya.
N'oge mgbanwe nke kansụl na 5 Ọgọstụ 2021, onye isi ala Ramaphosa kwupụtara na Minista nke nkwukọrịta na teknụzụ dijitalụ Stella Ndabeni-Abrahams na Ntshavheni ga-agbanwere ọkwa ndị minista.
